name: 【文化沙龍】《夢遊英倫音樂朝聖團2025：David Bowie/Beatles/Radiohead & More…》
location: 旅遊研究所 - 中華漆廠大廈 6 樓全層, 旺角廣東道1163號 中華漆廠大廈 6 樓 Hong Kong, KOW
about: 【文化沙龍】黃志淙 《夢遊英倫音樂朝聖團2025：David Bowie/Beatles/Radiohead & More…》日期：2025-07-26 （六)時間：1700-1830地點：旺角廣東道1163號中華漆廠大廈 6 樓內容簡介：童年青年中熱愛的音樂人物，在生命中都一定擁有極重要的位置，坂本龍一的音樂持續啟迪許多人，2025年1月和3月的東京心路遊讓我們體驗了許多奇蹟興感動。接下來，我們將踏上九月的英倫朝聖之旅，探索The Beatles、David Bowie、Radiohead 等樂隊的影響力。志淙將分享多年來英倫音樂與樂隊的情懷，和多次飛越參與音樂節及訪問的難忘故事，以及九月朝聖之旅的心思。除了會參觀 V&A 的最新 David Bowie 展覽，還有 Radiohead 在牛津的特展，志淙將分享豐富的第一手故事和資料。黃志淙博士 aka Chi Chung’s Choice資深電台DJ/聲音藝術家/音樂/文化/教育/策展人。現任香港知專設計學院 Curator-in-residence 駐校創作家，主力負責 V Music Library 黑膠唱片體驗館，亦曾在母校HKU主理GE十多年。自1980s一直致力透過電台電視等媒體，推廣多元音樂、文化藝術。”Chi Chung’s Choice” 更與無數世界級巨匠及本地大師新血等對話、交流，甚至合作。志淙曾策劃多個跨地域/文化項目，包括大衛寶兒的華語歌《剎那天地》（2000）、坂本龍一 《async》 大碟 (2017)、坂本龍一學堂（2024）、ImagineLand 天空草地 （2024…）。近年更親身導航坂本龍一東京心路遊。【夢遊英倫音樂朝聖團】詳細資料：🌟行程亮點嘉賓導賞 朝聖 David Bowie 最新 V&A 大型藏展Abbey Road 週邊城市漫步 訪尋音樂名人歷史足跡傲遊牛津 參觀 Radiohead 展覽及分享生活逸聞ABBA Voyage 享受頂尖藝術科技音樂視覺體驗穿梭 Brick Lane & Notting Hill 發掘在地音樂文化走進 Design Museum 重尋 80s 新浪漫發源地 Blitz Club【夢遊英倫音樂朝聖團】📅日期：2025 年 09 月 28 日（日）至 10 月 3 日（五）（倫敦集合）📝團號：EXTUKLHR202509A🔥🔥🔥本團現正接受報名 🔥🔥🔥🌿機會難逢 名額有限 額滿即止！🌿如欲報名，請 WhatsApp 6618 3022 與旅行社職員接洽🌿或致電 2713 0998 查詢🌿或電郵至 info@extravelism.com旅遊研究所｜Extravelism旅行社牌照號碼：354367https://www.instagram.com/extravelism/

name: UNHEARD 2025: musiquarium feat. DONNA GOLDN, A Vivid Machine, BABY DIWATA
location: Terrible Baby, Music Room, 4/F Eaton HK, 380 Nathan Road Hong Kong, KOW
about: musiquarium is a music series featuring live performances by local & regional emerging artists, showcasing new works and works in progress.DONNA GOLDN:Donna Goldn is a Belgian vocalist with a diverse background. A self-described creative nomad, her identity defies singular definitions. The artist extends a heartfelt invitation to experience her authentic world. She's been diligently crafting pop songs in both Korean and English.For the uninitiated, check out the viral video for her song "Grape Wifey (청포도 마누라)" here.A Vivid Machine:A Vivid Machine is a Hong Kong based electronic rock duo that fuses alternative and electronic music to create songs that explore various themes on existence centering around the dual forces of emotions and logic... and occasionally nonsense.BABY DIWATA:ONE HALF OF PANIC LIBRARY A RAVE/ART PROJECT WITH THEIR DJ PARTNER LOVELESS, THEY ARE DRIVEN BY THEIR DESIRE FOR CREATIVE EXPRESSION THAT GOES AGAINST THE GRAIN, PANIC LIBRARY IS DEDICATED TO FEMMES, NON-BINARIES AND NON-CONFORMISTS.____________________Tickets: HKD150 w/ one drink

name: Silk & Smoke: Allure Chet Baker Night (  Incubating Series)
location: allure customised hair, 3 School Street Tai Hang Hong Kong, HKI
about: Silk & Smoke: Allure Chet Baker NightChet Baker’s music drips with silky elegance and smoky allure. His haunting trumpet, intimate voice, and turbulent charm immortalized him as jazz’s timeless romantic, forever painting nocturnal melodies of love and longing.絲絨與煙霧：Chet Baker 的迷人之夜Chet Baker 的音樂散發著絲絨般的優雅與煙霧般的魅力。他令人心碎的小號、親密的歌聲與動蕩的魅力，將他永遠定格為爵士界永恆的浪漫詩人，描繪愛與渴望的夜晚旋律。Immerse yourself in a special tribute to the legendary jazz trumpeter Chet Baker. Featuring the talented Kowloon Swing Outfit, the evening promises a heartfelt reinterpretation of Baker's soulful melodies and intimate style, which have left an indelible mark on jazz.誠邀您參與向傳奇爵士樂小號手 Chet Baker 致敬的特別活動。當晚將由出色的九龍搖擺樂隊（Kowloon Swing Outfit）帶來對 Baker 那充滿靈魂的旋律和親密風格的深情演繹，這些都是他在爵士樂界留下的不朽印記。Photo & Video : Foo king Wai, Fuji（ #符敬偉 @foofoto_p )Featured BandKowloon Swing Outfit (@thekowloonswingoutfit)- David Batchelor (Trumpet & Vocals, @davidbatch)- Bruce Hunnisett (Saxophone, @brucehunnisett)-Toshi Horiguchi (Piano ,@toshi_origuchi)- Jimmy Pittman (Bass, @jimmy.pittman.90)-Carlos Vieira (Percussion)✨ Tai Hang’s Allure Pass 2025Discover the charm of Tai Hang, where hair, music, and cuisine blend seamlessly into a unique urban escape. 💇‍♀️🎶🍴 From chic styling to live melodies and culinary delights, this chill community invites you to explore, indulge, and unwind. 🌟 Your Allure Pass opens doors to exclusive perks—just show it and enjoy.✨ 大坑 Allure Pass 2025探索大坑的獨特魅力，感受髮型設計、音樂與美食的完美交融。💇‍♀️🎶🍴 從時尚造型到動人旋律，再到美味佳餚，邀您放鬆身心，盡情享受。🌟 憑Allure Pass尊享專屬禮遇!Kowloon Swing OutfitLed by David Batchelor, the Kowloon Swing Outfit spans a diverse range of jazz styles from traditional to modal jazz of the late 1960s. The band has attracted large audiences on multiple occasions and frequently collaborates with swing dancers to provide a lively and accessible music experience.由 David Batchelor 領銜，Kowloon Swing Outfit 橫跨從傳統到1960年代末期的模態爵士的多元爵士樂風格。這支樂隊曾在多個場合吸引眾多觀眾，並經常與搖擺舞者合作，帶來充滿活力且易於接近的音樂體驗。Explore the Artistry of MusiciansDavid BatchelorDavid Batchelor, with 30 years of international experience performing in Europe and Asia, has a rich and diverse musical style that spans from classical to rock, and of course, jazz. His major influences include jazz greats like Chet Baker, Miles Davis, Louis Armstrong, and Clark Terry.David Batchelor 擁有30年的國際經驗，曾在歐洲和亞洲演出，他的音樂風格豐富多元，從古典到搖滾，當然還有爵士樂。他的主要影響包括爵士樂巨匠如 Chet Baker、Miles Davis、Louis Armstrong 和 Clark Terry。Toshi HoriguchiA Tokyo native, Toshi's musical journey was ignited during his teenage years when he discovered the enchanting sounds of soul music and jazz, particularly influenced by the captivating styles of Marvin Gaye and Bill Evans.Based in Hong Kong, Toshi adopts an adventurous approach to his crati, fearlessly delving into a wide range of musical genres that have influenced his artistic sensibilities. Through collaborations with local and international musicians, he blends diverse musical influences, resulting in performances that transcend boundaries and captivate audiences. As he continues to navigate and contribute to the dynamic music scene in Hong Kong, Toshi remains commited to exploring new horizons and establishing himself as a versatile and dynamic force within the everevolving tapestry of the city's musical landscape.來自東京的Toshi在青少年時期發現了靈魂音樂和爵士的迷人聲音，特別受到Marvin Gaye和Bill Evans的風格影響啟發。目前居住在香港的Toshi採取大膽的音樂探索方式，無畏地深入多種音樂類型，這些都深刻影響了他的藝術感性。通過與本地和國際音樂家的合作，他融合了多元的音樂影響，創造出超越界限並吸引觀眾的表演。隨著他繼續在香港動態的音樂場景中前行和貢獻，Toshi致力於探索新的視野，力求在這個不斷演變的音樂織錦中成為一名多才多藝且充滿活力的重要人物。Jimmy PitmanJimmy Pitman, originally from Chicago, Illinois, is a bassist and educator currently based in Hong Kong. Since arriving in HK in 2012, he has been gigging consistently on both bass guitar and upright bass. He has gained a reputtion as a first call player for his fluency in numerous styles and tasteful accompaniment.Jimmy has performed recently at the 2023 Make Music Festival, 2021 Hong Kong West Kowloon Jazz Festival, the 2019 Hangzhou “Jazz On The Lake” International Jazz Festival, the 2019 “Art Of Crati” crati beer festival at the HK Asia Society, and the 2018 HK International Jazz Festival.原籍美國伊利諾伊州芝加哥的Jimmy Pitman，是一位低音大提琴兼音樂教育家，目前定居於香港。自2012年來到香港以來，他一直積極參與電貝斯和低音大提琴的演出，以其流暢的多種音樂風格和高雅的伴奏技巧而被認為是首屈一指的演奏者。Jimmy近期的演出包括2023年的香港音樂節、2021年香港西九龍爵士音樂節、2019年杭州“湖畔爵士”國際爵士音樂節、2019年香港亞洲社會“藝術與手工啤酒”節，以及2018年香港國際爵士音樂節。CARLOS VIERACarlos Vieira's drumming is the rhythmic heartbeat of any musical group, effortlessly adapting from jazz to funk to pop. Originating from Lisbon, Portugal, Carlos has studied an eclectic mix of musical styles with legendary musicians in global music capitals. His career has taken him around the world, performing with pioneering artists from Portugal and beyond, and sharing his knowledge at the Hot Club Jazz School of Lisbon. His global footprint includes performances in numerous countries and residencies at luxury venues like the Mandarin Oriental in Hong Kong and The Ritz Carlton in Shanghai. Carlos's beats are a testament to his passion and versatility, laying down the rhythm for audiences worldwide.卡洛斯·維埃拉的鼓點是任何樂隊的節奏心臟，他能毫不費力地從爵士樂轉換到放克樂再到流行樂。他來自葡萄牙里斯本，曾在全球音樂之都與傳奇音樂家學習多種混合音樂風格。他的職業生涯讓他周遊世界，與來自葡萄牙及其他地方的開創性藝術家合作表演，並在里斯本的熱門爵士俱樂部爵士學校分享他的知識。他的全球足跡包括在多個國家的表演和在如香港文華東方酒店和上海麗思卡爾頓酒店等豪華場所的駐場表演。卡洛斯的節奏是對他的熱情和多才多藝的證明，為全世界的觀眾奠定節奏。This event serves as a dynamic hub for emerging and experienced artists to converge, explore, and refine their artistic talents. It's an opportunity for meaningful connections and creative exchanges within our community. Whether you are an integral part of the jazz community or newly exploring its rich history, join us in a unique setting that fosters the evolution of music and nurtures a community shaping the future of the arts.這個活動是新興和經驗豐富的藝術家聚集、探索和提升藝術才能的活躍中心。它是在我們私密社群內建立意義連接和創意交流的機會。無論您是爵士樂社群的一份子，還是剛開始探索其豐富的歷史，歡迎參加我們獨特的活動，共同促進音樂的演進，塑造藝術社群。Allure Friends Privacy PolicyAllure Music Salon is committed to protecting your privacy and complies with the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance. This policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, sharing, and protection of personal data.Types of Personal Data Collected- name, email and phone numberPersonal data is used to send you messages. If you choose not to receive such communications, an opt-out option is available.Personal data is treated confidentially, disclosed only to authorized personnel or as required by law. We will use a third-party email system to send you emails.Personal data is retained only as long as necessary for the purpose for which it was collected and is protected using adequate security measures to prevent unauthorized access or loss.Access to and Correction of Personal DataYou have the right to access and correct your personal data held by Allure Music Salon. Requests can be made to Allure Music Salon via email at alluremusicsalon@gmail.com or through other provided contact methods.承諾保護隱私Allure Music Salon 致力於保護您的隱私，並遵守《個人資料（私隱）條例》。本政策概述了我們關於收集、使用、分享及保護個人資料的做法。收集的個人資料類型姓名、電郵及電話號碼個人資料用於向您發送資訊。如果您選擇不接收此類通訊，可以選擇退出。個人資料會保密處理，僅向授權人員披露或根據法律要求披露。我們會使用第三方電郵系統向您發送電郵。個人資料僅在收集目的所需的時間內保留，並採用適當的安全措施防止未經授權的存取或丟失。存取及更正個人資料您有權存取和更正Allure Music Salon 持有的您的個人資料。可以通過電郵至 alluremusicsalon@gmail.com 或其他提供的聯繫方式，提出請求。Allure Incubating Fridays is exclusive event series (Music Appreciation Workshop) presented by Allure Music Salon.Allure Incubating Fridays 是由 Allure Music Salon 提供獨家活動系列 (音樂鑑賞工作坊)。

name: Canvas of Sound : A Harpist’s Palette
location: MG Tower, 133號 Hoi Bun Road 10 樓 E 室 Kwun tong, KOW
about: Welcome to Canvas of Sound : A Harpist’s Palette! Join us for a magical morning filled with enchanting melodies and beautiful harmonies. Our talented harpist will paint a musical masterpiece that will transport you to a world of tranquility and serenity.Date: Sat Jul 26 2025Time: 4:00 p.m.Location: MG Tower no.133, Hoi Bun Road floor 10E, Sky Music StudioDescription:🎶✨ Harp & Art: A Synesthetic Evening of Sound and Color 🎨🌈Debut Solo Concert – This July in Hong Kong 🪉❤️Join me for a deeply personal and immersive evening where music and art come together in a unique expression of synesthesia — the connection between sound and color.I’ll be performing my first solo harp concert, and each piece is paired with original paintings I’ve created, inspired by the emotions and colors evoked through the music. This is more than a concert — it’s a sensory journey through sound, art, and emotion.🌟 All ticket proceeds after deducting all the relevant costs will be donated to:🕊 PARACLETE – Care and Comfort Angels Project, a charity offering therapy and emotional support for those experiencing bereavement.PARACLETE holds special meaning for me and my mum — after my father passed away, they were there for her, offering steady support during a difficult time. This concert is my way of giving back to those who helped us heal.🎨 Original artworks will also be available for purchase after the show. A portion of those proceeds will go to PARACLETE as well.🎟 Seating is limited – for a more intimate and meaningful experience.Let the harp's delicate melodies and vibrant visuals transport you to a place of peace, color, and connection.Reserve your seat today and support causes that make a real difference.

name: PikSum & friends’ music party
location: allure customised hair, 3 School Street Tai Hang Hong Kong, HKI
about: Join us at the end of July for another not-to-be-missed musical feast at the century-old Allure stone house. Following the sensational success of our event a year and a half ago, we are delighted to welcome back Erhu artist Chan Pik-Sum and her friends for another extraordinary evening. Immerse yourself in a sensory feast of melodies that promises to be an enchanting experience.我們誠邀您七月底，再次來Allure世紀石屋，參加又一個不容錯過的音樂盛宴！繼一年半前難忘的音樂派對後，我們非常高興再次迎來二胡藝術家壁沁及其好友們，共同創造另一個非凡的夜晚。沉浸在旋律的感官盛宴中，體驗一場迷人的聆聽之旅。Explore the Artistry of MusiciansThe Sirens emerged out of informal acoustic jams and late-night harmonising in the street after closing time to create a unique alternative folk sound. Made up of four Lamma women: Aleks (fiddle), Erin (guitar), Jeni (cello) and Lebo (cajon) re-interpret everything from traditional Irish to The Eurythmics, by way of Neil Young, Eva Cassidy, and Amy Winehouse. The Sirens’ harmonies lean towards a mysterious, moody sound evocative of their mythological namesakes luring sailors lost at sea.Allure Music Salon: Evenings of Music and MasteryAllure Music Salon, nestled in Tai Hang's historic Century Stone House, Hong Kong, hosts enthralling musical evenings and workshops. Our Incubating series and Masters events spotlight emerging talents and seasoned maestros, fostering connections and inspiring audiences. Join us for a transformative experience where creativity shapes the future of music.Allure Music Salon 位於香港大坑歷史悠久的世紀石屋，舉辦迷人的音樂之夜和工作坊。我們的孵化系列和大師活動突顯新興才能與資深大師，促進互動並啟發觀眾。加入我們，體驗在創意塑造音樂未來的轉變性體驗。Allure Friends Privacy PolicyAllure Music Salon is committed to protecting your privacy and complies with the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance. name: The Wanch Jazz Series: Johnny & The JazzBird – Vintage Jazz Romance
location: The Wanch, 90 Jaffe Road #1/F Wanchai, HKI
about: The Wanch Jazz Series: Johnny & The JazzBird – Vintage Jazz RomanceStep into an evening of pure jazz elegance at The Wanch! On Wednesday, 30th July, let Johnny Lau & The JazzBird transport you to the golden age of crooners and candlelit clubs.Johnny Lau is no ordinary frontman—he’s a Hong Kong music legend with a rich baritone and magnetic stage presence, equally at home crooning Nat King Cole or firing up the room with a touch of rockabilly flair. Backed by The JazzBird, Johnny brings new life to the greatest hits of the 30s to 50s, including classics such as “What a Difference a Day Made” and “Cry Me a River.” Expect a setlist that’s all about mood and nostalgia.Whether you’re a jazz aficionado or just looking for a night of smooth vocals and vintage charm, this is an experience you’ll remember. Let Johnny and The JazzBird’s artistry sweep you away.Book your tickets now!Event Details:Wednesday, 30th July 20259:00 PM - 10:15 PMThe Wanch, 1/F, Henan Building, 90 Jaffe Road, Wan ChaiTickets: HK$300Walk-in Tickets: HK$350 (all tickets include one complimentary drink and HK$100 food & drink voucher)The Wanch 爵士系列：Johnny & The JazzBird – 復古爵士浪漫夜來The Wanch 感受一晚優雅的爵士優雅氛吧！7月30號（星期三），Johnny Lau & The JazzBird 會帶你穿越時空，帶你們回去那個音樂的黃金年代。Johnny Lau 不只是一個歌手，他簡直是香港樂壇傳奇，低沉磁性嗓音加上超強台風，無論唱 Nat King Cole 嘅經典 ballad，還是節奏強勁的rockabilly，君魅力四射。今次再度與The JazzBird 合作，Johnny 會為你重新演繹三、五十年代嘅經典名曲，例如《What a Difference a Day Made》和《Cry Me a River》，setlist 滿載情懷及氣氛。無論你是否爵士迷，還是想一晚享受巨磁性的歌聲同復古情調，這個晚上一定令你難忘。就讓Johnny 同 The JazzBird 嘅音樂魅力帶你飛一轉！活動詳情：2025年7月30日（星期三）晚上9點至10點15分The Wanch（灣仔謝斐道90號河南大廈1樓）預售飛：HK$300即場飛：HK$350（包括一杯飲品及HK$100餐飲券）

name: UNHEARD 2025: musiquarium ft. cehryl & hirsk/ Adam,Bill & Nelson/Fingergap
location: Terrible Baby, Music Room, 4/F Eaton HK, 380 Nathan Road Hong Kong, KOW
about: musiquarium is a music series featuring live performances by local & regional emerging artists, showcasing new works and works in progress.Cehryl & Hirsk:Local musicians cehrl and hirsk will join forces to produce a special idm set.Cehryl is a singer, songwriter, producer, and instrumentalist based in Hong Kong.Hirsk (also known as Khris Nung) is a Hong Kong pop musician, producer and live electronic musician. He graduated from Berklee College of Music in the United States , majoring in electronic music production and sound design. In 2017, he was selected as one of the music units of the Pop Kulture Art Festival in Berlin, Germany.FINGERGAP:FINGERGAP Hong Kong. FINGERGAP is on a mission to fuse the seemingly conflicting genres of Canto-pop and footwork, inviting international audiences to experience the beauty of Cantonese over pulsating tempos at 160 BPM.Electroacoustic conversations with Adam, Bill and NelsonA free improvisation performance featuring a computer, a synth, a fretless banjo, a noise box and voice.Adam Neutron builds and destroys musical instrumentsBill Hsu works with electronics and real-time video. He is based in San Francisco.Nelson Hiu is a retired dance accompanist currently enjoying playing synthesizersMusiquarium 是一個音樂系列，展示本地和區域新興藝術家的現場表演，展示新作品和進行中的作品。cehryl & hirsk：本地音樂人 cehryl 和 hirsk 將聯手製作一場特別的 IDM 演出。Cehryl 是一位駐港的歌手、詞曲創作人、製作人和樂器演奏者。Hirsk（亦稱為 Khris Nung）是一位香港流行音樂人、製作人和現場電子音樂演奏者。他畢業於美國伯克利音樂學院，主修電子音樂製作和聲音設計。2017年，他被選為德國柏林流行文化藝術節的音樂單位之一。FINGERGAP：FINGERGAP 是一個香港音樂團體，致力於融合看似矛盾的廣東流行音樂和 footwork，邀請國際觀眾在160 BPM 的脈動節拍中體驗廣東話的美。與 Adam、Bill 和 Nelson 的電聲對話：這是一場自由即興的表演，使用電腦、合成器、無品位班卓琴、噪音盒和聲音。Adam Neutron 建造和摧毀音樂器具。Bill Hsu 從事電子音樂和即時視頻工作，現居三藩市。Nelson Hiu 是一名退休的舞蹈伴奏者，目前享受演奏合成器的樂趣。

about: $320｜ Early Bird: $280 | 👫 Group of 4: $1,000 | Join after 10pm $200Gypsy Swing Sensations 感受吉普賽搖擺Experience the vibrant energy of 1930s Paris with the Hot Club de HK at the Allure Music Salon located in Century Stone House.Photo & Video: @foofoto_p (符敬偉 Foo King Wai )Immerse yourself in the captivating rhythms of Gypsy swing as guitars, violins, and a double bass weave an enchanting musical tapestry. Complemented by mesmerizing vocals, join us for an exhilarating evening filled with timeless melodies and step into the magic of a bygone era.體驗1930年代巴黎的活力，在世紀石屋的Allure音樂沙龍內，與及爵士樂隊Hot Club de HK度過美妙的夜晚。沉浸在吉普賽搖擺音樂的迷人節奏中，吉他、小提琴和低音大提琴交織出一幅迷人的音樂畫卷。搭配迷人的歌聲，一起享受充滿永恆旋律的振奮夜晚，重返那消逝已久的魔幻時代。FeaturingGuitar:Simon ChoiGuitar:Neil LauViolin: Bob PangDouble Bass: Vera CuraVocals: Adrianna Tang✨ Tai Hang’s Allure Pass 2025Discover the charm of Tai Hang, where hair, music, and cuisine blend seamlessly into a unique urban escape. 💇‍♀️🎶🍴 From chic styling to live melodies and culinary delights, this chill community invites you to explore, indulge, and unwind. 🌟 Your Allure Pass opens doors to exclusive perks—just show it and enjoy.✨ 大坑 Allure Pass 2025探索大坑的獨特魅力，感受髮型設計、音樂與美食的完美交融。💇‍♀️🎶🍴 從時尚造型到動人旋律，再到美味佳餚，邀您放鬆身心，盡情享受。🌟 憑Allure Pass尊享專屬禮遇!Explore the Artistry of MusiciansHot Club de Hong KongHot Club de HK focuses on vintage 30’s - 40’s France's gypsy jazz. Inspired by Django Reinhardt - the father of gypsy jazz, the band adopts his arrangement styles, playing techniques to interpret various genres of music. From European traditional to American songbooks; swing to bossa nova; film music to pop… Hot Club de HK devotes to build gypsy jazz community in Hong Kong, and present the beauty of gypsy jazz music.The only active Gypsy Jazz band in town! Formed by Simon Choi, Neil Lau (Guitarist); Sing Pun (Guitarist); Bob Pang (Violinist) and Vera Cura(Double Bassist). Hot Club de HK focuses on vintage 30’s - 40’s France's gypsy jazz. Inspired by Django Reinhardt - the father of gypsy jazz, the band adopts his arrangement styles, playing techniques to interpret various genres of music. From European traditional to American songbooks; swing to bossa nova; film music to pop… Hot Club de HK devotes to build gypsy jazz community in Hong Kong, and present the beauty of gypsy jazz music.Hot Club de Hong Kong可能是香港唯一活躍的法式吉卜賽爵士(Gypsy Jazz/Jazz Manouche)樂隊，為你呈獻上世紀三四十年代嘅巴黎韻味。Hot Club de Hong Kong由本地樂隊Cowhead與Blaster兩位結他手Simon Choi與Neil Lau，兩個畢業於香港教育大學音樂系嘅小提琴手Bob Pang 、結他手Sing Pun和低音大提琴手Vera組成。成員們彈奏各音樂類型多年，機緣巧合下認識到嚟自法國嘅吉卜賽爵士樂，被深深吸引，於是組成Hot Club de Hong Kong。樂隊演奏風格啟發自吉卜賽爵士奠基者Django Reinhardt及Stéphane Grappelli，以三十年代巴黎風格為基調，糅合美式爵士、拉丁節奏，以原聲結他同小提琴演奏一系列吉卜賽爵士及爵士標準曲。現時世界各地皆有Hot Club，向Hot Club de France的Django Reinhardt致敬。Hot Club de Hong Kong致力在香港普及吉卜賽爵士樂、建立爵士樂社群、為本土音樂注入新元素。Allure Music Salon: Evenings of Music and MasteryAllure Music Salon, nestled in Tai Hang's historic Century Stone House, Hong Kong, hosts enthralling musical evenings and workshops. name: UNHEARD 2025: Make Resonant Machines with Sky Kung
location: Terrible Baby, Music Room, 4/F Eaton HK, 380 Nathan Road Hong Kong, KOW
about: Join Sky Kung in this hands-on workshop to build an electroacoustic instrument that transforms everyday materials into evolving soundscapes. Participants will experiment with vibrating plates made of metal, wood, springs, and other objects using transducers and motors. The resulting resonances will be captured with contact microphones and shaped through an internal feedback circuit to explore drones, textures, and sonic unpredictability.This workshop is ideal for anyone interested in building electroacoustic instruments. No prior experience in DIY electronics is required, though some familiarity with playing musical instruments is preferred. Participants will get hands-on experience soldering components to a PCB, and experimenting with transducers and contact mics to discover new sounds.Sky Kung is a Hong Kong-based media artist, music producer, and instrument maker. His works across Sound Art, Performance and Device Making. His practice seeks to expand artistic potential, empowering creators to shape their own tools, while bridging technical experimentation with expressive freedom.⁠He is the 2025 Sonic Transmission Artist-in-Residence at CMHK and recently completed a residency at iii (instrument inventor initiative) in The Hague. The instrument created in this workshop is inspired by the ideas and insights he gained during that residency.As a guitarist in the band Lucid Express, he creates dreamlike textures with effect pedals while also designing his own, combining digital signal processing and analog circuitry.Bi- lingual (Cantonese & English)加入 Sky Kung 的這個實踐工作坊，打造一個電聲樂器，將日常材料轉化為不斷變化的聲音景觀。參加者將使用換能器和馬達實驗金屬、木材、彈簧和其他物品製作的振動板。產生的共鳴將通過接觸麥克風捕捉，並經由內部反饋電路塑造，以探索無人機、質感和聲音的不可預測性。這個工作坊非常適合任何對構建電聲樂器感興趣的人。無需具備 DIY 電子學的先前經驗，但對於演奏樂器有一定熟悉度者將更佳。參加者將獲得實際經驗，將元件焊接到 PCB，並實驗換能器和接觸麥克風，以發現新聲音。Sky Kung 是一位駐港的媒體藝術家、音樂製作人和樂器製作人。他的作品涉及聲音藝術、表演和設備製作。他的實踐旨在擴展藝術潛能，賦予創作者塑造自己工具的能力，同時將技術實驗與表達自由相結合。他是2025年 CMHK 的聲音傳遞藝術駐留藝術家，最近在海牙的 iii（樂器發明倡議）完成了一個駐留計劃。本工作坊中創造的樂器靈感來自於他在該駐留期間獲得的想法和見解。作為樂隊 Lucid Express 的吉他手，他使用效果踏板創造夢幻般的質感，同時設計自己的效果器，結合數字信號處理和模擬電路。講座將以雙語（廣東話和英語）進行。

name: UNHEARD 2025: Building Buddha: Lo-fi, high volume Ambient sound art
location: Kino, Eaton House (Co-working), 380 Nathan Road 1/F Hong Kong, KOW
about: At this artist talk, Christiaan will be sharing stories and sounds from the 20 year evolution of the Buddha Machine. Exploring the machine as “album,” art object and mass produced sound art device. He will offer insights and ideas on how independent artists can move beyond traditional concepts of how to release music and will share a short ambient mix using sounds from the Buddha Machine as well as other artists who have remixed Buddha Machine loops in their own works.在這次藝術家講座中，Christiaan將分享來自佛唱機於過去20年間演變的故事和聲音。他將探討將機器視為「專輯」、藝術物件和大規模生產的聲音藝術裝置的概念。他將分享對於獨立藝術家如何超越傳統音樂發行概念的見解及想法，並分享一小段使用佛唱機聲音進行的氛圍混音，以及其他藝術家在其作品中重新混音佛唱機的音效。

name: UNHEARD 2025: Office Panic!
location: Eaton HK, 4/F Terrible Baby Music Room, 380 Nathan Road 4/F Kowloon, KOW
about: Office Panic!In this lobby refurbishment, attendant officers are invited to experience desktop windows,codes of audiovisuals,bugs debugging,live sampling and experimental sound.Liz (@2izia)Andio (@andiosound)Tsun Yeung (@tsunwinston)Pazu (@paaaazu_ )Ken (@kenwkl_ )__________________________The Sonic Officer is an art project initiated and curated by Liz Wong, co-curated by Andio Lai that will turn our music room into an office performance space where the audience are invited to experience desktop windows, codes of audiovisuals, bugs debugging, live sampling and experimental sound. The project focuses on the art forms of computational audiovisual and experimental sound as a foundation, pairing with various media art practices such as live coding, device art, screen-based programming.Sonic Officer是一個由 Liz Wong 發起和策劃、Andio Lai 共同策劃的藝術項目，將我們的音樂室轉變為一個「辦公空間」，邀請觀眾體驗桌面視窗、視聽代碼、錯誤除錯、現場取樣和實驗聲音。該項目以計算視聽和實驗聲音的藝術形式為基礎，結合各種媒體藝術實踐，如現場編碼、設備藝術和基於螢幕的編程。

name: UNHEARD 2025: Into the Vapor: a foray into an Internet Electronic Genre
location: Terrible Baby, Music Room, 4/F Eaton HK, 380 Nathan Road Hong Kong, KOW
about: A brief journey through the first decade of vaporwave (an acousmatic, sampling-based genre of internet music) - and its offshoots - in the form of a playlist with artist's favourite selections.Angus Lee (b. 1992) is a Hongkong-born performer-composer who has appeared in international music festivals across North America, Asia, continental Europe and the UK. He has been a musician of the Hong Kong New Ensemble since 2016, and has been a full time faculty member of The University of Hong Kong's Music Department since 2022. His current doctoral research combines his creative compositional work with an investigation of the internet music genre, _vaporwave_. In his (almost non-existent) spare time outside of practising, rehearsing, performing, composing and teaching, he is an avid reader of philosophy and political theory, and enjoys swimming, hiking and playing badminton.Talk will be Bi- lingual (Cantonese & English)對於蒸汽波（這是一種基於聲音和取樣的網路音樂類型）及其衍生形式的第一個十年的簡要旅程，以藝術家的最愛選曲的播放列表形式呈現。Angus Lee（1992年生）是一位出生於香港的表演者和作曲家，曾參加北美、亞洲、大陸歐洲和英國的國際音樂節。自2016年以來，他一直是香港新音樂團的音樂家，並自2022年起成為香港大學音樂系的全職教員。他目前的博士研究結合了他的創作作曲工作與對網路音樂類型蒸汽波的探討。在他幾乎不存在的空閒時間裡，他熱衷於閱讀哲學和政治理論，並喜歡游泳、健行和打羽毛球。講座將以雙語（廣東話和英語）進行。

name: UNHEARD 2025: A2B x Mystery Train presents GNX by Kendrick Lamar
location: Terrible Baby, Music Room, 4/F Eaton HK, 380 Nathan Road Hong Kong, KOW
about: In this session of A2B, Eaton's ongoing vinyl- sharing series, James of Eaton Radio HK's Mystery Train podcast will lead the talk and listening session to deconstruct and demystify the themes, sounds and inspirations behind Kendrick Lamar's recent work, GNX. Hailing from California's Bay Area, where much of the album's sound can be attributed to, James who was raised on hip hop and Mystery Train co-host Cheryl will offer their analysis on the themes and decisions that went into the release and what propelled it's popularity.A2B is Eaton's ongoing vinyl- sharing series, where guests are invited to speak at length about an important or seminal work in their music- listening experience and Mystery Train is a radio show on Eaton Radio HK hosted by Cheryl Chow and James Acey where they pick songs from the mystery box and talk about music life and everything in between.Talk to be held in English在這一場 A2B 中，Eaton 的黑膠分享系列Eaton Radio HK 的《Mystery Train》播客主持人 James 將主持一場講座和聆聽環節，深入剖析和解密 Kendrick Lamar 最近的作品《GNX》中的主題、聲音和靈感。James 來自加州灣區，該處的音樂風格對專輯的聲音影響深遠，而他在嘻哈音樂中長大，加上《Mystery Train》的共同主持 Cheryl，將提供對專輯主題和發行決策的分析，以及促使其受歡迎的原因。A2B 是 Eaton 持續進行的黑膠分享系列，邀請嘉賓深入討論在他們的音樂聆聽經驗中重要或具有開創性的作品。《Mystery Train》是 Eaton Radio HK 上由 Cheryl Chow 和 James Acey 主持的廣播節目，他們從神秘盒子中挑選歌曲，並討論音樂生活及其間的點滴。講座將以英語進行。

name: UNHEARD 2025: Free Jazz Workshop with Jerold Chu
location: Terrible Baby, Music Room, 4/F Eaton HK, 380 Nathan Road Hong Kong, KOW
about: Learn how to improvise to create brand-new melodies, moods and soundscapes with Hong Kong's finest jazz musicians.____________Workshop to be Bilingual (Cantonese & English)

name: UNHEARD 2025: Staying (un)derground between safe & dangerous
location: Kino, Eaton House (Co-working), 380 Nathan Road 1/F Hong Kong, KOW
about: This panel brings together K41, a club space rooted in Ukraine’s underground culture, alongside Hong Kong collectives Panic Library and Shimai Tribe. Together, they reflect on the tensions of staying under the radar and how underground spaces can offer both refuge and risk, resistance and exposure.  The conversation will explore how communities navigate visibility, care, survival, and creative expression amid political, social, and spatial precarity.

name: UNHEARD 2025: 不明體_虛 | unknown(i) by Chi Him Chik
location: Tomorrow Maybe, 4/F Eaton HK, 380 Nathan Road, Kowloon Hong Kong, KOW
about: 不明體_虛 | unknown(i) is part of the series 不明體 | unknown which consists of two audiovisual live sets that explore the meaning of entity and existence. Both pieces use the physical body of the performer as a medium to present and interpret the idea of presence, while the version _實 | (0) in a way of being, and the other version _虛 | (i) of nonbeing. Bio:Media artist and performer Chi Him Chik draws inspirations from reflections on conflicts, dilemma, and pain from personal experiences as well as social and political events, while creating works through the combination of media, from audio to visuals, generative to compositional, fixed media to interactive art, in, but not limited to, a performative sense.www.chihimchik.com

name: UNHEARD 2025: Soundtrack to a Coup d'Etat (2024)
location: Kino, Eaton House (Co-working), 380 Nathan Road 1/F Hong Kong, KOW
about: A documnetary film where jazz and decolonization are entwined in a historical rollercoaster that rewrites the Cold War episode that led musicians Abbey Lincoln and Max Roach to crash the UN Security Council in protest against the murder of Patrice Lumumba.Directed by Johan GrimonprezLanguage: English, French & Russian (w/ Chinese Subtitles)Runtime: 150 mins

name: UNHEARD 2025: Ethnic Minority Community Soundscapes w/ AL-ISTIQOMAH (PSA)

name: UNHEARD 2025: Searching Out, Saving, and Sounding Spaces
location: Terrible Baby, Music Room, 4/F Eaton HK, 380 Nathan Road Hong Kong, KOW
about: This presentation will introduce Edward Sanderson's research into the spaces for sound art and experimental music as they have developed in the Chinese Mainland and Hong Kong, and describe some of my recent activities based on this research.For the last 15 years or so he has focused on spaces for sound art and experimental music and spatially-related practices that find their homes in these spaces. Geographically, he restricts himself to the Chinese Mainland and Hong Kong (already a huge area), and the period is from the late 1990s to the present day, although he also deals with some earlier material for context. This research has led him to build up a physical archive of material, currently based in Hong Kong, and from this I have produced various texts, events, and curated exhibitions.This talk will be structured around four important stages in the development of this research: His PhD at HK Baptist University's Academy of Visual Art; the 2023 “Sounds Like Print” display at Tai Kwun Contemporary; the recently concluded exhibition “It Always Sounds Somewhere” at the Inside-Out Art Museum in Beijing; and the performance series “Exit-Entry” which invites Mainland artists to perform alongside local artists, and which serves as a further means to promote connections and knowledge sharing between the Chinese Mainland and Hong Kong._______________Bio:Dr. Edward Sanderson is a researcher and curator focusing on contemporary non-mainstream sonic practices from the Chinese Mainland and Hong Kong. In 2025 Edward curated the exhibition "It Always Sounds Somewhere" at Inside-Out Art Museum in Beijing, presenting an extensive set of installations of the multiple forms of space used for sound art and experimental music, supplemented by a series of related performances and talks. Edward is currently developing a physical and online archive of sound-related material, and co-curating the Exit-Entry performance series bringing together Chinese Mainland and local artists to play in Hong Kong’s underground venues.Talk to be held in English這場演講將介紹 Edward Sanderson 對中國大陸和香港聲音藝術及實驗音樂空間的研究，並描述他基於這項研究所進行的一些近期活動。在過去的15年左右，他專注於聲音藝術和實驗音樂的空間，以及在這些空間中發展的與空間相關的實踐。他的研究地理範圍限於中國大陸和香港（已經是一個相當龐大的區域），研究時間從1990年代末到現在，同時他也會涉及一些早期的材料以提供背景。這項研究使他建立了一個實體檔案庫，目前位於香港，並由此產生了各種文本、活動和策展展覽。這場演講將圍繞這項研究發展的四個重要階段進行：他在香港浸會大學視覺藝術學院的博士學位；2023年在大館當代藝術中心的“Sounds Like Print”展覽；最近結束的北京 Inside-Out 藝術博物館的展覽“它總是在某處響起”；以及“Exit-Entry”表演系列，邀請大陸藝術家與本地藝術家共同表演，進一步促進中國大陸與香港之間的聯繫和知識分享。_______________簡介：Edward Sanderson 博士是一位研究者和策展人，專注於來自中國大陸和香港的當代非主流聲音實踐。在2025年，Edward 在北京 Inside-Out 藝術博物館策劃了展覽“它總是在某處響起”，展示了多種用於聲音藝術和實驗音樂的空間形式的安裝作品，並輔以一系列相關的表演和講座。Edward 正在開發一個與聲音相關的實體和在線檔案庫，並共同策劃 Exit-Entry 表演系列，將中國大陸藝術家和本地藝術家聚集在香港的地下場地演出。講座將以英語進行。

name: Live Music: Classic Rock

about: 9:30pm - Road to Ruin11pm - Sham Pain BuddhaEntry with one purchase.

name: UNHEARD 2025: SOSOS presents: Open Session with SOPHY
location: Kino, Eaton House (Co-working), 380 Nathan Road 1/F Hong Kong, KOW
about: Open Session is an artist-led conversation and listening event curated by singer-songwriter & producer SOPHY under her independent label, SOSOS. Each session invites musicians and creatives whom SOPHY has collaborated with to share behind-the-scenes insights and engage in meaningful dialogue with a live audience. Open to the public, the series aims to foster deeper artistic exchange and strengthen connections within Hong Kong’s creative community. SOSOS is an independent label and music production studio founded by Hong Kong singer-songwriter and producer SOPHY. It brings together artists, musicians, and creatives through record production, cross-disciplinary projects, and cultural events like the Open Session series. SOSOS is dedicated to amplifying emerging voices, sparking honest dialogue, and building a more connected, supportive creative community in Hong Kong and beyond.

name: UNHEARD 2025: Eaton Tapes Live by Ink Element
location: Terrible Baby, Music Room, 4/F Eaton HK, 380 Nathan Road Hong Kong, KOW
about: "THE EATON TAPES" is an album released on March 2025. It represents a true cross-cultural exchange of ideas, techniques, and musical expressions. This six-month musical journey  began at the Unheard festival last year and eventually led to a collection of 12 songs by 5 artists.The Ink Element performance takes the songs written by the French producer and brings them to stage, along with previously unreleased material of his next album (Strollers on the highway) and some highlights of his portfolio.Ink Element is a Hong-Kong based artist who transcends boundaries between experimental electronic and alternative rock, creating immersive sonic journeys ranging from 4 to 12 minutes.Blending house/techno rhythms with indie rock influences, organic drum kits, evolving synthesizers, and both instrumental and vocal compositions.The artist has released 3 albums, 4 EPs and 6 singles in the past three years, compiling multiple tunes, creating on stage, unveiling new tracks at every show, which makes every stage performance unique.

name: UNHEARD 2025: A fling into the vibe of Pure LoFi (Arturia)
location: Terrible Baby, Music Room, 4/F Eaton HK, 380 Nathan Road Hong Kong, KOW
about: Pure LoFi is a software instrument dedicated to sounds with personality and attitude. If you had only one synthesizer to compose a soundtrack for exploring abandoned 1980s shopping malls, the catacombs under Paris, or the endless “backrooms” of internet lore, Pure LoFi would be it. This workshop introduces sound explorers to new landscapes they can design, sculpt and shape with audacity and style. Workshop to be led by Ink Element. Ink Element transcends boundaries between experimental electronic and alternative rock,creating immersive sonic journeys ranging from 4 to 12 minutes. Blending house/technorhythms with organic drum kits, evolving synthesizers, and both instrumental and vocalcompositions.

name: 2025 Hong Kong Law Fair
location: Hall 5G, Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre, 1  Expo Drive Wan Chai, HKI
about: Welcome to the 2025 Hong Kong Law Fair!Meet over 50 leading law firms, professional legal organisations and law schools in Hong Kong - all gathered under one roof to offer you insights, guidance, and opportunities to connect with the legal profession.This is your chance to ask questions, explore career paths, and build networks that matter.Free admission is offered to penultimate LLB, double law degree and JD students. Law students from other years are also welcome to register for free admission, but is subject to availability.Non-law and LLM students are welcome to attend with a registration fee of HKD 500, and admission is subject to a quota.Registration is required to attend, and successful registrants will receive a QR code before the event.We look forward to seeing you at Hall 5G, Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre!*In the event of adverse weather conditions (e.g. T8 or above, or a Black Rainstorm Signal), the Law Fair Committee will consider rescheduling the event to Sunday, 7 September 2025, subject to venue availability. Further details will be announced if this occurs.

name: GENAI Summit
location: The Wave, 4 Hing Yip Street 10th Floor Kwun Tong, KOW
about: THE BIGGEST GENAI EVENT IN HONG KONG STARTS SOON, DONT MISS OUT香港 GenAI Summit是一項在香港舉辦的頂尖科技盛會，旨在匯聚香港本地的商界領袖與人工智能 (AI)創新者，提供一個重要的交流與合作平台，讓您深入了解及探索生成式 AI (Generative AI) 在各行各業的實際應用。The GenAI Summit is a cutting-edge event held in Hong Kong bringing together business leaders and AI Innovators in Hong Kong under one roof, the chance to explore real world applications and apply them to your business.GenAI Summit is your one-stop destination to explore the future of enterprise and consumer AI creative solutions, the place to be for Generative AI & Digital Transformations.Brilliant minds converging to explore cutting-edge advancements, from machine learning breakthroughs to real-world AI creative applications. You’ll dive into thought-provoking talks from industry leaders that inspire bold ideas, while networking sessions connect you with innovators, collaborators, and mentors in the AI space.#Artificial intelligenceWHAT TO EXPECTAI IN REAL WORLD APPLICATIONSINDUSTRY LEADERS IN GEN AIFUTURE GEN AI INNOVATIONSOfficial Website : https://www.hkgen.ai/

name: The Justice Conference Asia 2025
location: The Vine Church, 29 Burrows St Hong Kong Island
about: The Justice Conference Asia returns to Hong Kong with a renewed vision and a steadfast commitment to advancing God’s heart for justice in our city and across the region. This year’s theme, Re-Imagine, invites us to challenge our imagination, disrupt our realities, and energise our actions for practical outcomes. We invite you to join us as we explore what it means to envision a world transformed by God’s boundless vision of human flourishing and justice.

name: 絲竹和韻 — 拔萃男書院國樂會＆TCO 附設青少年國樂團音樂會2025

name: Summer Nights @ Shaw Auditorium: Robot Dreams
location: Main Hall, Shaw Auditorium, HKUST HONG KONG, NT
about: 逸夫演藝中心誠邀您參加盛夏電影放映活動，一同欣賞溫馨感人的動畫電影《汪汪夢裡人》。本片以狗狗與機器人之間的深厚友情為主題，透過精緻的動畫畫面與電影歌曲，細膩描繪孤獨、夢想與現實交織的情感旅程。全片無對白，但每個動作與表情都勝過千言萬語。這將是一場讓您放鬆心情、感受真摯情感的觀影體驗，誠邀您蒞臨共度美好時光！Shaw Auditorium cordially invites you to a summer film screening featuring the heartwarming animated film "Robot Dreams." This touching story showcases the profound friendship between a dog and a robot, brought to life through exquisite animation and music. With no dialogue, the film conveys deep emotions through gestures and expressions. Join us for this captivating cinematic experience that promises to soothe your mind and touch your heart!故事簡介榮獲奧斯卡最佳動畫長片提名，感動橫掃全球60+項大獎及提名，被譽為媲美《優獸大都會》及《星聲夢裡人》的年度最佳電影！單身狗狗厭倦了寂寞的獨居生活，決定購買智能機械人作伴。二人一拍即合，日夜漫遊紐約大街小巷。正當他們以為找到人生中的彼此，命運卻在一次沙灘狂歡後將他們硬生生拆散。狗狗帶著思念回復孤獨的生活日常，機械人則獨自躺在沙灘上幻想著再次回到狗狗身邊……在這場無盡的思念旅程中，有沒有一個重來的機會？SynopsisBased on a graphic novel by Sara Varon, Goya-Award-winning director Pablo Berger’s first venture into animation is a colourful, vibrant and touching buddy drama. To escape solitude, Dog assembles Robot from a build-it-yourself kit. Setting off on a whimsical exploration of New York City, the new best friends develop an inseparable bond as they savour curbside hotdogs and roller-skate through Central Park. However, their friendship is abruptly brought to a halt when an accident leaves Robot stranded on a beach.備註 Remarks:本次放映之影片不設對白。 No Dialogue.電影全長103分鐘。Film Duration: 103 minutes.電影級別: I (適合任何年齡人士觀看)。Film Classification: I (Suitable for All Ages).免費入場，請預先網上報名。 Free admission. Online registration is required.請於放映前15分鐘抵達場地。 Please arrive at the venue 15 minutes before the screening.入場守則 Admission Rules:不設劃位，先到先得。Free-seating on first-come-first-served basis.場內嚴禁飲食。No food and drinks are allowed in the venue.未經許可，請勿攝影、錄音或錄影。Unauthorized photo-taking, audio or video recording is strictly prohibited.主辦單位保留更改節目、演出者及座位安排的權利。如有任何爭議，主辦單位保留最終決定權。The organizer reserves the right to make changes to the program, performers and seating arrangement. In case of dispute, the decision of the organizer shall be final.
